transf.name: replace
transf.arg1: (ind_sum (fun (k1:int) -> black_box_coeff theta (int_to_bv k1 k) *. int_qft_coeff (bv_to_int (int_to_bv k1 k)) (-' bv_to_int (int_to_bv i k)) k) 0 (power 2 k))
transf.arg2: (ind_sum (fun (y1:int) -> cpower (ang_exp (real_to_ang (theta -. (i_to_c i *. pow_inv_2 k)))) y1) 0 (power 2 k))

transf.name: replace
transf.arg1: (ind_sum (fun (y1:int) -> cpower (ang_exp (real_to_ang (theta -. (i_to_c (mod1 (best_appr theta k) (power 2 k)) *. pow_inv_2 k)))) y1) 0 (power 2 k))
